name: Re: Memos on Faith and Life
description: Comprised of 31 short daily devotionals, our hope is that this small volume will offer words that will inspire honest reflection and compassionate living.  In other words, in the same way the Gospel of John tells us that "the Word became flesh," our desire is that these words might gain skin as we join God in rebuilding, restoring, and renewing the world in which we live.

name: The Breeze
description: my debut record.  recorded over the course of three and a half years, in the back of a tanning salon, in my friend's living room, and at a local radio station, The Breeze represents how difficult the process of creation can sometimes be.  but here it is... hope you enjoy what you hear!  if you do, feel free to share it with the folks who fill up your world... (quick note- add $2.00 for shipping. that'd be swell)
